revision.text:
{{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WikiProject Biography |living=no |class=Start |politician-work-group=yes |military-work-group=yes |listas=Wootten, George }} {{WikiProject Military history|class=start |B1=no |B2=yes |B3=yes |B4=yes |B5=yes |Australian-task-force=yes|WWI=yes|WWII=yes|Biography=yes}} {{WikiProject Australia|class=Start |importance=}} }} == [[Wikipedia:WikiProject_Biography/Assessment#Class_parameter|Biography assessment rating]] comment == [[Wikipedia:WikiProject_Biography/Assessment/Assessment_Drive|WikiProject Biography Summer 2007 Assessment Drive]] The article may be improved by following the [[Wikipedia:WikiProject_Biography#WikiProject_Biography_11_easy_steps_to_producing_at_least_a_B_article|WikiProject Biography 11 easy steps]] to producing at least a B article. -- '''[[User:Yamara|Yamara]]''' 16:32, 3 July 2007 (UTC) His involvement with the Old Guard doesn't endear him to me, but I love this: "to the officer discreetly watching him test a wooden bench [Wootten] remarked: 'When you are my size, Hill, you sit with circumspection'."[http://www.adb.online.anu.edu.au/biogs/A160699b.htm] Hehe. [[User:Grant65|Grant]] | [[User talk:Grant65|Talk]] 10:06, 21 April 2007 (UTC) :And this from [[Frank Bell (educator)|Frank Bell]]'s ''Undercover University'':
"[12 September 1945] We had a large parade to welcome Gen Wootten today. The first announcement that we heard was that he had arrived and was having his lunch on board ship. He had a good lunch too, I should say. He had the most prodigious stomach we have seen for many a long day. They say his weight is twenty-two stone."
:One Wootten for every four ex-POWs at Batu Lintang! [[User:Jasper33|Jasper33]] 14:26, 21 April 2007 (UTC) == WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Tag & Assess 2008 == Article reassessed and graded as start class. --[[User:Dashiellx|dashiellx]] ([[User talk:Dashiellx|talk]]) 12:07, 5 May 2008 (UTC) == "Old Guard" == It's the New Guard (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/New_Guard), not the Old Guard, and it wasn't formed by any government, conservative or otherwise. — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/61.69.24.230|61.69.24.230]] ([[User talk:61.69.24.230|talk]]) 20:54, 3 February 2014 (UTC) :No, it was the [[Old Guard (Australia)|Old Guard]]. [[User:Hawkeye7|Hawkeye7]] ([[User talk:Hawkeye7|talk]]) 19:22, 4 February 2014 (UTC) Please read up about Eric Campbell's New Guard! — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/61.69.24.230|61.69.24.230]] ([[User talk:61.69.24.230|talk]]) 08:45, 21 February 2014 (UTC)
